mapper.update: update jobapp set appResult = #{appResult}, appResultDate = #{appResultDate} where appNo = #{appNo}
update jobapp set appInterviewDate = #{appInterviewDate}, appInterviewDateDate = #{appInterviewDateDate} where appNo = #{appNo}
mapper.select: select appResult, appResultDate from jobapp where appNo = #{appNo}
select DATE_FORMAT(appInterviewDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as appInterviewDate, DATE_FORMAT(appInterviewDateDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as appInterviewDateDate from jobapp where appNo = #{appNo}
select distinct a.jobNo as jobNo, jobTitle, DATE_FORMAT(jobRegisterDate ,'%Y-%m-%d') as jobRegisterDate from jobapp a, jobinfo b where a.jobNo = b.jobNo and comId = #{value}
